front.title: Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (v3): Schema for the Remote Access Dialin User Service (RADIUS)

abstract.t: This document defines a schema for the Remote Access Dialin User Service(RADIUS). This schema makes it possible to integrate a RADIUS serverwith an LDAP-based directory service, making it possible for anorganization to maintain a single store of user information. Thisconsolidation is desirable since it results in a reduction in theadministrative workload, and eliminates the need to synchronize acrossmultiple user information stores.
